mapper.select: SELECT WP_SID AS WPSID, WP_TITLE AS WPTITLE, WP_CONTENT AS WPCONTENT, WP_START AS WPSTART, WP_END AS WPEND, WP_ADDR1 AS WPADDR1, WP_CREATED AS WPCREATED, WP_MAX_PET AS WPMAXPET, IP_SID AS IPSID, WL_SID AS WLSID FROM WALK_POST
SELECT IWPT_SID AS IWPTSID, IWPT_NAME AS IWPTNAME FROM INDEX_WALK_POST_TAG ORDER BY IWPT_SID
SELECT IWI_SID AS IWISID, IWI_PRICE AS IWIPRICE, IWI_POSSIBLE_MATCH_COUNTS AS IWICOUNT, IWI_GRADE AS IWIGRADE FROM INDEX_WALK_INFO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WALK_POST(WP_SID, WP_TITLE, WP_CONTENT, WP_START, WP_END, WP_ADDR1, WP_MAX_PET, IP_SID, WL_SID, WP_EXTRAADDR) VALUES(SEQ_WALK_POST.nextval, #{wptitle}, #{wpcontent}, TO_DATE(#{wpstart}, 'HH24:MI'), TO_DATE(#{wpend}, 'HH24:MI'), #{wpaddr1} , #{wpmaxpet}, 1, #{wlsid}, #{wpextraaddr})
INSERT INTO WALK_POST_PHOTO(WPP_SID, WPP_PATH, WP_SID, WPP_NAME) VALUES(SEQ_WPP.nextval, #{wpppath}, #{wpsid}, #{wppname})
INSERT INTO WALK_POST_TAG(WPT_SID, WP_SID, IWPT_SID) VALUES(SEQ_WPT.NEXTVAL, #{wpsid}, #{iwptsid})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(WP_SID),0) AS WPSID FROM WALK_POST

SELECT WTBSID, WTBQUESTION, WTBANSWER, WTBPOINT FROM ( SELECT WTB_SID AS WTBSID, WTB_QUESTION AS WTBQUESTION, WTB_ANSWER AS WTBANSWER, WTB_POINT AS WTBPOINT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE) AS rn FROM WALK_TEST_BANK ) WHERE rn < 10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WALK_TEST_PAPER (WTR_SID, WTB_SID1, WTB_SID2, WTB_SID3, WTB_SID4, WTB_SID5, WTB_SID6, WTB_SID7, WTB_SID8, WTB_SID9, WTB_SID10) VALUES (#{wtrsid}, #{wtbsid1}, #{wtbsid2}, #{wtbsid3}, #{wtbsid4}, #{wtbsid5}, #{wtbsid6}, #{wtbsid7}, #{wtbsid8}, #{wtbsid9}, #{wtbsid10})
mapper.select: SELECT WB.WB_SID AS WBSID, WB.WB_START AS WBSTART, WB.WB_END AS WBEND FROM WALK_CANCEL WCL JOIN WALK_BOOK WB ON WCL.WB_SID = WB.WB_SID JOIN WALK_CREATE_CART WCC ON WB.WCC_SID = WCC.WCC_SID JOIN MEMBER MEM ON WCC.MEM_SID = MEM.MEM_SID JOIN JOIN_MEMBER JM ON MEM.MEM_SID = JM.MEM_SID WHERE TO_CHAR(WCL.WCL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND JM.MEM_SID = #{memSid}

SELECT WRSID, WRTITLE, WRCONTENT, WRRATING, WRDATE, MEMSID, PMEMSID, WBSID, WBSTART, WBEND FROM WALK_REVIEW_VIEW WHERE TO_CHAR(WRDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND MEMSID = #{memSid}

SELECT WRR.WP_SID AS WPSID FROM WALK_REPORT_COMPLETE WRC JOIN INDEX_MANAGER_ACTION IMA ON WRC.IMA_SID = IMA.IMA_SID JOIN WALK_REPORT_RECEIVE WRR ON WRC.WRR_SID = WRR.WRR_SID WHERE IMA.IMA_SID = 4 AND TO_CHAR(WRC.WRC_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND WRR.WP_SID = ( SELECT WP.WP_SID FROM WALK_POST WP JOIN WALK_LICENSE WL ON WP.WL_SID = WL.WL_SID JOIN WALK_FOLLOWING_LIST WFL ON WL.WL_SID = WFL.WL_SID JOIN MEMBER MEM ON WFL.MEM_SID = MEM.MEM_SID JOIN JOIN_MEMBER JM ON MEM.MEM_SID = JM.MEM_SID WHERE MEM.MEM_SID = #{memSid})

SELECT TO_CHAR(WB.WB_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WBSTART, TO_CHAR(WB.WB_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WBEND , MEM.MEM_SID AS PMEMSID, WB.WB_SID AS WBSID FROM WALK_BOOK WB JOIN WALK_CREATE_CART WCC ON WB.WCC_SID = WCC.WCC_SID JOIN MEMBER MEM ON WCC.MEM_SID = MEM.MEM_SID WHERE WCC.MEM_SID = #{memSid} ORDER BY WBSTART

SELECT TO_CHAR(WB.WB_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WBSTART, TO_CHAR(WB.WB_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WBEND, MEM.MEM_SID AS MEMSID, WB.WB_SID AS WBSID FROM WALK_BOOK WB JOIN WALK_LICENSE WL ON WB.WL_SID = WL.WL_SID JOIN WALK_TEST_SUBMIT WTS ON WL.WTS_SID = WTS.WTS_SID JOIN WALK_TEST_RECEIVE WTR ON WTS.WTR_SID = WTR.WTR_SID JOIN MEMBER MEM ON WTR.MEM_SID = MEM.MEM_SID WHERE MEM.MEM_SID = #{memSid} ORDER BY WBSTART

SELECT TO_CHAR(WB.WB_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WBSTART, TO_CHAR(WB.WB_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WBEND, MEM.MEM_SID AS MEMSID, WB.WB_SID AS WBSID FROM WALK_BOOK WB JOIN WALK_LICENSE WL ON WB.WL_SID = WL.WL_SID JOIN WALK_TEST_SUBMIT WTS ON WL.WTS_SID = WTS.WTS_SID JOIN WALK_TEST_RECEIVE WTR ON WTS.WTR_SID = WTR.WTR_SID JOIN MEMBER MEM ON WTR.MEM_SID = MEM.MEM_SID WHERE MEM.MEM_SID = #{memSid} ORDER BY WB.WB_DATE DESC
SELECT WRSID, WRTITLE, WRCONTENT, WRRATING, WRDATE, MEMSID, PMEMSID, WBSID, WBSTART, WBEND FROM WALK_REVIEW_VIEW WHERE MEMSID = #{memSid} ORDER BY WRDATE DESC
SELECT JM_NICKNAME AS PJMNICKNAME, MEM_SID AS PMEMSID FROM JOIN_MEMBER
